description: The fleece light line has long proven to be super comfortable on the skin and so lightweight that it is barely noticeable. But our fleece light companions are ideal even in icy temperatures! Thanks to its fine tasmanian merino wool, high breathability and stretchability, this soft underwear stands for unparalleled comfort and an incomparable body-climate. The waffle structure on the inside ensures good moisture wicking and thus feels warm and dry on the skin – even in very low temperatures or on demanding ascents.
name: Ortovox Fleece Light Zip Neck - Mens
